explanation: The DP table was initialized with -MOD (i.e. -1e9+7) which is not sufficiently small as a sentinel value; adding positive X/Y values to this sentinel can produce valid-looking (but incorrect) states and corrupt transitions. I changed the sentinel to a very small integer (-10**18) so it safely acts as negative infinity for the problem's constraints and does not interfere with valid sums.
